firstEducationDescription: I am a Specialist in Economics (it's a real grade between Bachelor and Master). Finance and credit specialization. So yeah my knowledge is beyond computer science.
secondEducationDescription: After a lot of self learning I started visiting specialized courses to catch up with missing computer science knowledge. Studying here I was involved in a lot of tiny pet projects, mostly with HTML/CSS/JS. This experience helped me get my first job as a developer.
